title: Mohamed Soufan - Software Engineer
welcomeText:
# H﻿ey, I'm Mohamed Soufan

## S﻿oftware Engineer from Lebanon

> As a full-stack engineer, I'm capable of building almost any kind of software and I take pride in developing customized software solutions that meet my clients' unique needs and help them achieve their business goals.
>
> Along with my team, we have built numerous websites, mobile apps, and software for various industries including e-Commerce, SaaS platforms, food and beverage projects and custom software ideas.
>
> We have also helped many companies around the world boost productivity, decrease costs and increase their sales by building the right software for them.
>
> Since I was young, I became familiar with RATs, encryptions, and how antiviruses detect trojans, and became fascinated by these topics. I challenged myself to bypass any securities and eventually became the person that companies hire to test their security.
seoDescription: I'm a software engineer from Lebanon with a passion for using Flutter to build high-quality mobile apps.
